code: @Before @Override public void setUp() throws Exception {     try {         super.setUp().         fail("Should have thrown ResolveEndpointFailedException").     } catch (FailedToCreateRouteException e) {         ResolveEndpointFailedException cause = assertIsInstanceOf(ResolveEndpointFailedException.class, e.getCause()).         assertTrue(cause.getMessage().endsWith("Unknown parameters=[{xxx=true}]")).     } }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() {             from("direct:start").setHeader(Exchange.HTTP_METHOD, POST).to("http4://www.google.com?httpClient.xxx=true").         }     }. }
